divs: Sighting DetailsI saw this back in 2009! The same pulsating cloud just outside over my house. I woke up to let my dogs out and saw one entire cloud pulsing non stop. Last time I called the police to get a witness but they came when the sun came up and missed it. This time I called CNN but they did not seem to care. The cloud pulsated continuously until day break. I filmed it like last time but its hard to see the pulsating on video. The I zoomed in to see black spheres in the form of a traingle. Then they disintegrated. I can not imaging why a cloud would pulsate!
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around July 28th 2012
Summary: One cloud outside my window was pulsing then I saw a triangle
